Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model.GameModel

Class LeaderRequirements

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.View.ReducedModel.RedLeaderRequirements
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.GameModel.LeaderRequirements
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class LeaderRequirements
extends RedLeaderRequirements
Defines a Card with the characteristics required from Leader Card; a Level and a Colour. If The cards doesn't require a minimum level it is set to 1
See Also:
